text:
William Alan Mohr (born May 23, 1959) is an American politician and businessman. He is a member of the Constitution Party. He is the Constitution Party nominee for Vice President of the United States in the 2020 election.
Mohr was born in Grand Rapids, Michigan and raised in Byron Center, Michigan.
He has worked as a trucker and food production plant manager. He is currently "self employed in the building/maintenance trade."

annotations.surface_form: Vice President of the United States
